channel.title: {508} RuneScape Demon Wars {508}
channel.description:
[b][i][size=18pt]RuneScape Demon Wars[/size][/i][/b]
(this is going to be a 508 offline server)
Content: [size=12pt]1[/size] in this server you will be able to walk up and down a staircase [size=12pt]2[/size] in this server all the ladders and stairs will work in: varrock-falador-camelot-adrougne-edgville ect [size=12pt]3[/size] in every chat the player will talk to and you will be able to choose what 2 say [size=12pt]4[/size] there will be added secrets in every city [size=12pt]5[/size] there will be more info when i release this server [size=12pt]6[/size] pics will be added 2 [size=12pt]7[/size] this server is going to kick some ass!!!
[size=24pt]This server is not only going to be a server wich can be played online, this server will be a replacement for runescape if you cant go online to play!!![/size]
(thanks for the advice)
[size=14pt]Update log:[/size]
[size=8pt]day: 31, of month: 7th[/size] [size=8pt]today i have made doors to open possible![/size] [size=8pt]i have bin adding stairs, ladders and trapdoors for players to move up and down houses[/size] [size=8pt]and i have bin finishing up the god spells and the curse and weaken spells [/size]
[size=14pt]thats all for today tomorrow i am going to make you able to burn locked doors and much more[/size]

item.title: {508} RuneScape Demon Wars {508}
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

The first 2 are basically the same thing, and the last 3 aren’t even content.

A replacement for RuneScape…?

Good luck I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: {508} RuneScape Demon Wars {508}
item.dc:creator: @skiller009 skiller009
item.description:
@skiller009 wrote:

[size=18pt]RuneScape Demon Wars[/size]

(this is going to be a 508 offline server)

Content:
[size=12pt]1[/size] in this server you will be able to walk up and down a staircase
[size=12pt]2[/size] in this server all the ladders and stairs will work in: varrock-falador-camelot-adrougne-edgville ect
[size=12pt]3[/size] in every chat the player will talk to and you will be able to choose what 2 say
[size=12pt]4[/size] there will be added secrets in every city
[size=12pt]5[/size] there will be more info when i release this server
[size=12pt]6[/size] pics will be added 2
[size=12pt]7[/size] this server is going to kick some ass!!!

[size=24pt]This server is not only going to be a server wich can be played online, this server will be a replacement for runescape if you cant go online to play!!![/size]

(thanks for the advice)

[size=14pt]Update log:[/size]

[size=8pt]day: 31, of month: 7th[/size]
[size=8pt]today i have made doors to open possible![/size]
[size=8pt]i have bin adding stairs, ladders and trapdoors for players to move up and down houses[/size]
[size=8pt]and i have bin finishing up the god spells and the curse and weaken spells [/size]

[size=14pt]thats all for today tomorrow i am going to make you able to burn locked doors and much more[/size]
